channel.title: No Physics Transfer When Gibbing Hemizombies
channel.description:
The "torso" zombies (usually produced by catching a zombie in the outer edge of an explosion, although some spawn pre-existing in the game as well) don't seem to transfer momentum to their gibs properly. Thus, gibbing one with shotgun fire, explosions, etc. typically results in this:
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/275101049236850489/4ACB3B04A617C44FFF69F17255DE846930CD2040/[/img]
